nodes.text: Scay Danson was a member of the Imperial Security Bureau. A few months following the Battle of Yavin, Danson filed a report regarding the possible threat of the Bounty Hunters' Guild.

Danson went on to become one of the galaxy's biggest industrial saboteurs. Working for the highest bidder, Scay preferred to target megacorporations such as Sienar Fleet Systems and BlasTech Industries.
